full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 191 of 262 1902
LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross
1 A. I think the Gulfstream was not an LLC; I think it was incorporated. And I think that the Boeing was an LLC.
2 Q. I'm sorry. Let me rephrase the question.
3 The two aircraft we're talking about, the Boeing and the Gulfstream, were actually owned by companies?
4 A. Correct.
5 Q. I'll use that general term. Is that correct?
6 A. That's correct.
7 Q. Okay. So the companies that owned the planes were controlled by Mr. Epstein, right?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. But the actual owner on paper was a company; correct?
10 A. That is correct.
11 Q. Okay. So I think you recall that the Boeing 727 was owned by JEGE, Incorporated, right?
12 A. Correct.
13 Q. And the Gulfstream was owned by a company called Hyperion Air, right?
14 A. Correct.
15 Q. And I think Epstein also owned a Bell helicopter at some point, didn't he?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. Do you know about when he bought the Bell helicopter?
18 A. I believe it was 2002, maybe November 2002.
19 Q. Okay. That's a rough estimate?
20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013469

text_blocks.content:
1 A. I think the Gulfstream was not an LLC; I think it was incorporated. And I think that the Boeing was an LLC.
Q. I'm sorry. Let me rephrase the question.
The two aircraft we're talking about, the Boeing and the Gulfstream, were actually owned by companies?
A. Correct.
Q. I'll use that general term. Is that correct?
A. That's correct.
Q. Okay. So the companies that owned the planes were controlled by Mr. Epstein, right?
A. Yes.
Q. But the actual owner on paper was a company; correct?
A. That is correct.
Q. Okay. So I think you recall that the Boeing 727 was owned by JEGE, Incorporated, right?
A. Correct.
Q. And the Gulfstream was owned by a company called Hyperion Air, right?
A. Correct.
Q. And I think Epstein also owned a Bell helicopter at some point, didn't he?
A. Yes.
Q. Do you know about when he bought the Bell helicopter?
A. I believe it was 2002, maybe November 2002.
Q. Okay. That's a rough estimate?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. The text is printed, and there are no visible handwritten notes or stamps.
